Articles.Content:
Luckily false.

The user below me, more often than not, plays KSP in sessions longer than 3 hours.

Truthfully and shamefully, yes.

The user below is stuck in a phone booth with nothing to eat.

true, good thing i got my laptop with ksp.

the user below me likes churros

Nope. Never ate it. Looks nice though.

The user below me hates GlaDOS.

false (i mean who doesn't like an insane robot who tries to kill you around every corner)

the user below me plays beta games like warframe

If by "beta games" you mean early-access game, the answer is pretty clear.

The user below me has previously backed something on Kickstarter.

Nope, but I'd like to.

The user below me likes Warhammer 40k or Fantasy.

look at my avatar what do you think. infact i play the tabletop game.

the user below me plays space marines.

Nope. Never heard of it.

The user below me listens to soft dubstep.

Nope hard dubstep.

The user below me makes Jen test all their flights

Jeb I assume... Nope, Jeb is my average pilot.

The user below me is fascinated by big rocket engine.

Yup, it was jeb. And yes I am fascinated by big rocket engine. Use ALL the mainsails

the user below me eats burgers for breakfast

I tend to skip breakfast, or eat a light one. Burgers are not on the menu.

The user below me is now breathing manually.

Yes. I use manual instead of automatic.

The user below me plays Fallout 3.

Nop. I played the first, though, many centuries ago...

The user bellow me enjoys a bright, beautiful day with outdoor activities whenever he/she can.

Meh, I do like bright & beautiful days, but I have no friends (that are available as often as I am) that will play with me

The user below me lives on duna

Nope. Never been there.

The user below has more post than me.

Nope, I enjoy empty, post-nuclear-war wasteland with heavy cloud and radioactive breeze.

Nope.

The user below me killed the Adoring Fan in Oblivion.

Nope

The user below does have to not wait for a mod to approve their posts.

Ahh, true. I remember those days.

The user below knows them too.

True, that's only for a user's first 5 posts. You don't gain posts by posting in the Forum Games section, just so you know.

The user below me joined before persistence was added (0.14).

Pfft. Nope.

I've played it, though. I think... some old beat-up version, anyway, where there were no intercept markers / maneuver nodes.

The user above below just ninja'd me...

True, but it worked out fine. Possibly the only time a ninja-ing has ever turned out OK.

The user below me has visited Moho's poles. You know why.

Nope, but I know that they are notorious for being glitchy.

The user below me remember the golden age of Bobcat Ind.

Brings a tear to my eye...

The user below me remembers Spore.
